title: Ep 24 | Marvel Who? The Real-Life Superhero
description:
Where did Marvel, DC, and Star Wars get all their ideas? Probably from the New Testament. Also, Jase hunts with his new dog for the first time, Phil talks about physical death, and Al is seeing superheroes.
See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
